query.statement: SELECT #UPJANG# AS UPJANG , B.CODE AS STD_CODE , B.CODE_NAME AS DISP1 , DECODE(B.SET1,'Y','(ÇÊ¼ö)')||B.CONTENTS AS DISP2 , SCC_YN_FUN(NVL(A.USE_YN,B.SET2)) AS USE_YN , B.SET1 AS MAN_FLAG , #CUSER# AS CUSER , DECODE(A.USE_YN,'Y','I') AS INSFLAG FROM FMO_OP_DIARY_STD A ,(SELECT A.CODE , A.CODE_NAME , A.CONTENTS , A.SORT_SEQ , A.SET1, A.SET2 FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE A WHERE A.GROUP_CODE = 'FM0002' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y') B WHERE B.CODE = A.STD_CODE(+) AND A.UPJANG(+) = #UPJANG# ORDER BY B.SORT_SEQ
